description: Prints Fibonacci series for a fixed number of terms using loop
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., FibonacciBasic.java).
Compile: javac FibonacciBasic.java
Run: java FibonacciBasic

program_name: Fibonacci Series Using Scanner (User Input Terms)
description: Takes number of terms from user and prints Fibonacci series using loop
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., FibonacciScanner.java).
Compile: javac FibonacciScanner.java
Run: java FibonacciScanner
output:
Enter number of terms: 7
Fibonacci Series: 0 1 1 2 3 5 8

description: Prints Fibonacci series using recursive function (good for recursion practice)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., FibonacciRecursion.java).
Compile: javac FibonacciRecursion.java
Run: java FibonacciRecursion

description: Finds the Nth Fibonacci term using loop (more efficient than recursion)
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., FibonacciNthTerm.java).
Compile: javac FibonacciNthTerm.java
Run: java FibonacciNthTerm

description: Calculates sum of first N Fibonacci numbers using loop
instruction:
How to Run:
Save: File name must match the Class Name (e.g., FibonacciSum.java).
Compile: javac FibonacciSum.java
Run: java FibonacciSum
output:
Enter number of terms: 7
Fibonacci Series: 0 1 1 2 3 5 8
Sum of Fibonacci terms = 20
